races.name: Human
races.description: Versatile and adaptable, humans are the most common race in most worlds.

races.name: Elf
races.description: Graceful and long-lived, elves are magical beings with a strong connection to nature.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Stout and sturdy, dwarves are known for their craftsmanship and resilience.

races.name: Halfling
races.description: Small but brave, halflings value comfort and community.

races.name: Gnome
races.description: Curious and eccentric, gnomes have a natural aptitude for magic and invention.

races.name: Half-Elf
races.description: Combining the best traits of humans and elves, half-elves are diplomatic and adaptable.

races.name: Half-Orc
races.description: Strong and enduring, half-orcs combine human ingenuity with orcish might.

races.name: Tiefling
races.description: With infernal heritage, tieflings are often mistrusted but possess unique abilities.

races.name: Dragonborn
races.description: Proud and honorable, dragonborn possess draconic heritage and breath weapons.

races.name: Aasimar
races.description: Blessed with celestial heritage, aasimar often serve as champions of good.

classes.name: Fighter
classes.description: Masters of martial combat, skilled with weapons and armor.

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: Scholarly magic-users who learn their spells through dedicated study.

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: Skilled infiltrators and trap-finders who excel at stealth and precision.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: Divine spellcasters who serve deities and channel their power.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: Holy warriors who combine martial prowess with divine magic.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: Wilderness experts who combine martial skill with nature magic.

classes.name: Barbarian
classes.description: Fierce warriors who can enter a powerful battle rage.

classes.name: Bard
classes.description: Magical entertainers who weave magic through music and performance.

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: Nature priests who can shapeshift and command elemental forces.

classes.name: Monk
classes.description: Martial artists who harness the power of their body and soul.

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.description: Innate spellcasters with magic in their blood.

classes.name: Warlock
classes.description: Spellcasters who form pacts with powerful otherworldly entities.

classes.name: Artificer
classes.description: Innovative crafters who infuse magic into objects and create magical items.

alignments.name: Lawful Good
alignments.description: Believes in order, honor, and compassion. Follows rules and helps others.

alignments.name: Neutral Good
alignments.description: Believes in helping others without regard for rules or chaos.

alignments.name: Chaotic Good
alignments.description: Values freedom, individuality, and kindness. Rebels against unjust rules.

alignments.name: Lawful Neutral
alignments.description: Believes in order and organization above all else.

alignments.name: True Neutral
alignments.description: Believes in balance and avoids taking sides.

alignments.name: Chaotic Neutral
alignments.description: Values personal freedom and avoids authority.

alignments.name: Lawful Evil
alignments.description: Uses order and rules to get what they want, regardless of who gets hurt.

alignments.name: Neutral Evil
alignments.description: Does whatever they can get away with to advance themselves.

alignments.name: Chaotic Evil
alignments.description: Acts with arbitrary violence and destruction, valuing only their desires.

goals: Become the greatest in their craft
Discover the truth about their origins
Find a cure for a rare disease
